fw.name: SurfaceMachiningInterfaces

class.name: CATIMfg5AxisSpiralMilling
class.abstract: Interface for multi axis spiral milling operations.

method.name: RemoveStartDirectionGeometry
method.abstract: Removes 'Start Direction' geometry from the operation.

method.name: RemoveViewDirectionGeometry
method.abstract: Removes 'View Direction' geometry from the operation.

method.name: SetStartDirectionGeometry
method.abstract: Sets 'Start Direction' geometry to the operation.

method.name: SetViewDirectionGeometry
method.abstract: Sets 'View Direction' geometry to the operation.

class.name: CATIMfgMultiAxisContourDriven
class.abstract: Interface for multi axis contour driven operations.

method.name: RemoveFirstGuideGeometries
method.abstract: Removes all geometries of the first guide of a multi axis contour driven.

method.name: RemoveFirstStopGeometries
method.abstract: Removes all geometries of the first stop of a multi axis contour driven.

method.name: RemoveSecondGuideGeometries
method.abstract: Removes all geometries of the second guide of a multi axis contour driven.

method.name: RemoveSecondStopGeometries
method.abstract: Removes all geometries of the second stop of a multi axis contour driven.

method.name: RemoveViewDirectionGeometry
method.abstract: Removes 'View Direction' geometry from the operation.

method.name: SetFirstGuideGeometries
method.abstract: Adds geometry to the first guide of a multi axis contour driven.

method.name: SetFirstStopGeometries
method.abstract: Adds geometry to the first stop of a multi axis contour driven.

method.name: SetSecondGuideGeometries
method.abstract: Adds geometry to the second guide of a multi axis contour driven.

method.name: SetSecondStopGeometries
method.abstract: Adds geometry to the second stop of a multi axis contour driven.

method.name: SetStartDirection
method.abstract: Sets start direction of the operation.

method.name: SetViewDirectionGeometry
method.abstract: Sets 'View Direction' geometry to the operation.

class.name: CATIMfgMultiAxisCurveMachining
class.abstract: Interface for multi axis curve machining operations.

method.name: ConnectAllGuidesGeometries
method.abstract: Connect all the guides of the operation.

method.name: RemoveAuxiliaryGuidesGeometries
method.abstract: Resets all the auxiliary Guides geometry of the operation.

method.name: RemoveChecksGeometries
method.abstract: Resets all the Checks geometry of the operation.

method.name: RemoveEndElementGeometry
method.abstract: Resets the end element geometry of the operation.

method.name: RemoveGuidesGeometries
method.abstract: Resets all the Guides geometry of the operation.

method.name: RemovePartsGeometries
method.abstract: Resets all the Parts geometry of the operation.

method.name: RemoveStartElementGeometry
method.abstract: Resets the start element geometry of the operation.

method.name: RemoveToolAxisGeometry
method.abstract: Resets the 'Tool Axis' geometry of the operation.

method.name: SetAuxiliaryGuidesGeometry
method.abstract: Sets the auxiliary Guide geometry of the operation.

method.name: SetChecksGeometry
method.abstract: Sets the Check geometry of the operation.

method.name: SetEndElementGeometry
method.abstract: Sets the end element geometry of the operation.

method.name: SetGuidesGeometry
method.abstract: Sets the Guide geometry of the operation.

method.name: SetPartsGeometry
method.abstract: Sets the Part geometry of the operation.

method.name: SetStartElementGeometry
method.abstract: Sets the start element geometry of the operation.

method.name: SetToolAxisGeometry
method.abstract: Sets the 'Tool Axis' geometry to the operation.

class.name: CATIMfgMultiAxisCurveMachiningAuxDrive
class.abstract: Interface for multi axis curve machining operations.

method.name: Remove4XNormalConstraint
method.abstract: Removes the Direction to take as constraint used in case of tool axis mode equal to 4-Axis lead/lag.

method.name: RemoveAuxDriveGeometries
method.abstract: Resets all the Auxiliary drive geometry of the operation.

method.name: Set4XNormalConstraint
method.abstract: Sets the Direction to take as constraint used in case of tool axis mode equal to 4-Axis lead/lag.

method.name: SetAuxDriveGeometry
method.abstract: Sets the auxiliary drive geometry of the operation (geometry shown in the strategy tab).

class.name: CATIMfgMultiAxisIsoparametricMachining
class.abstract: Interface for multi axis isoparametric machining operations.

method.name: GetGeometricBeltsNumber
method.abstract: Retrieves the number of belts from part elements.

method.name: RemoveChecksGeometries
method.abstract: Removes all check elements from the operation.

method.name: RemovePartsGeometries
method.abstract: Removes all part elements from the operation.

method.name: SetChecksGeometries
method.abstract: Adds check geometry to the operation.

method.name: SetPartsGeometries
method.abstract: Adds part geometry to the operation.

method.name: SetPartsOrientation
method.abstract: Modifies the orientation of the part with regards to its geometry.

method.name: SetTransitionCorners
method.abstract: Sets the transition corners for all belts.

class.name: CATIMfgMultiAxisSweeping
class.abstract: Interface for multi axis sweeping operations.

method.name: RemoveStartDirectionGeometry
method.abstract: Removes 'Start Direction' geometry from the operation.

method.name: RemoveViewDirectionGeometry
method.abstract: Removes 'View Direction' geometry from the operation.

method.name: SetMachiningDirection
method.abstract: Sets the machining direction of the operation.

method.name: SetStartDirectionGeometry
method.abstract: Sets 'Start Direction' geometry to the operation.

method.name: SetViewDirectionGeometry
method.abstract: Sets 'View Direction' geometry to the operation.

class.name: CATISmgFactory
class.abstract: Interface to create Surface Machining entities.

method.name: CreateMachiningArea
method.abstract: Creates a machining area.

method.name: CreateNcGeometryFeature
method.abstract: Creates a nc geometry feature.

class.name: CATISmgMachiningAreaChecks
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to check elements of a Machining Area.

method.name: GetGeometricElements
method.abstract: Retrieves the geometric elements from the check of a Machining Area.

method.name: GetStatus
method.abstract: Checks if check elements are mandatory.

method.name: SetStatus
method.abstract: Modifies the geometry status of the check elements .

class.name: CATISmgMachiningAreaForbiddenZone
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to forbidden zone elements of a Machining Area.

method.name: GetGeometricElements
method.abstract: Retrieves the geometric elements from the forbidden zone of a Machining Area.

method.name: GetStatus
method.abstract: Checks if the forbidden zone is a mandatory parameter.

method.name: SetStatus
method.abstract: Modifies the geometry status of the forbidden zone.

class.name: CATISmgMachiningAreaGuidingCurves
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to Guiding Curves elements of a Machining Area.

method.name: GetResultingCATCurves
method.abstract: Retrieves the geometric elements from the guiding curves of a Machining Area.

method.name: GetStatus
method.abstract: Checks if the guiding curves are mandatory.

method.name: SetStatus
method.abstract: Modifies the geometry status of the guiding curves.

class.name: CATISmgMachiningAreaParts
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to part elements of a Machining Area.

method.name: GetGeometricElements
method.abstract: Retrieves the geometric elements from the part of a Machining Area.

method.name: GetStatus
method.abstract: Checks if the part is a mandatory parameter.

method.name: SetStatus
method.abstract: Modifies the geometry status of the part.

class.name: CATISmgNcGeometryManager
class.abstract: Interface to define new nc geometry parameters.

method.name: AddNcGeometryParameter
method.abstract: Adds a new parameter to a user machining feature or operation.

method.name: GetNcGeometryParameter
method.abstract: Returns the parameter of a manufacturing feature from its name.

class.name: CATISmgNcGeometryParameter
class.abstract: Interface to manage nc geometry parameters.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a manufacturing geometry or a nc geometry feature to the parameter.

method.name: Export
method.abstract: Creates a new nc geometry feature, fill it with the manufacturing geometries of the parameter and add it in the parameter.

method.name: GetGeometricElements
method.abstract: Retrieves the geometric elements of the members of the parameter.

method.name: GetNcGeometryFeatures
method.abstract: Retrieves nc geometry features of the parameter.

method.name: IsValid
method.abstract: Gets the status of the geometric element.

method.name: RemoveAll
method.abstract: Removes all the members of the parameter.

class.name: CATISmgProgramAddin
class.abstract: Interface to add toolbars in the Surface Machinist Workbench.
